message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $140. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I was hoping to keep the price closer to $120. Would you be willing to negotiate down to $130?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you. How about we meet in the middle at $135? I'm confident this product will be worth every penny to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
